mapper.sql: machine_id, `name`, machine_model, machine_num, machine_no, department_id, usage_state, remark, create_time, `status`
mapper.select:
select zmi.machine_no, zmi.`name`, zmi.machine_model, zmi.machine_num, zdi.name as department_name, zmi.usage_state, zmi.create_time, zmi.remark from zs_machine_info zmi left join zs_department_info zdi on zmi.department_id = zdi.department_id left join zs_machine_type_info zmti on zmti.id = zmi.machine_type_id
and zmi.department_id = #{departmentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and zmti.parent_id = #{machineNameId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and zmi.usage_state = 0
and zmi.usage_state = 1
and (zmi.usage_state = 0 or zmi.usage_state = 2)
and zmi.status = 0
select count(1) from zs_machine_info where machine_num = #{machineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from zs_machine_info where machine_no = #{machineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select zmi.machine_id,zmi.machine_no from zs_machine_info zmi left join zs_department_info zdi on zmi.department_id = zdi.department_id LEFT JOIN zs_machine_type_info zmti ON zmi.`machine_type_id` = zmti.`id`
and zmi.department_id = #{departmentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and zmi.usage_state = 0 and zmi.status = 0 and zmti.parent_id = 4
ORDER BY zmi.machine_id

select zmi.machine_id, zmi.machine_no from zs_machine_info zmi left join zs_department_info zdi on zmi.department_id = zdi.department_id LEFT JOIN zs_machine_type_info zmti ON zmi.`machine_type_id` = zmti.`id`
and zmi.department_id = #{departmentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and zmi.usage_state = 0 and zmi.status = 0 and zmti.parent_id = 3
ORDER BY zmi.machine_id
mapper.insert:

machine_id,
`name`,
machine_model,
machine_num,
machine_no,
department_id,
usage_state,
remark,
create_time,
`status`,

insert into zs_machine_info
machine_id,
`name`,
machine_model,
department_id,
usage_state,
remark,
create_time,
`status`,
machine_no,
machine_num,
machine_type_id,

mapper.update:
update zs_machine_info
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_model = #{machineModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_num = #{machineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_no = #{machineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usage_state = #{usageState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where machine_id = #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update zs_machine_info set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_model = #{machineModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, machine_num = #{machineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usage_state = #{usageState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where machine_id = #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
